revised_title: Radiative Balance in the Atmosphere: Estimating Local Energy Balance Using Surface Observations
tldr: The author estimates the net radiation entering or leaving the atmosphere and earth's surface at Kew Observatory during May 1953 to April 1954. They compare their findings with similar worldwide studies and discuss the albedo of the earth and atmosphere at different seasons. The study helps in understanding the local energy balance and contributes to the International Geophysical Year 1957-58 project.
